title: Threats On Twitter And Other Trending Topics On Social Media
teaser: Slate 's Julia Turner joins us for a look at how the news is reverberating online, from ISIS threats to the death of blogger Avijit Roy.
contentencoded:
Supporters of the self-declared Islamic State, or ISIS, have issued threats to Twitter co-founder Jack Dorsey because the social network has been blocking accounts associated with the group.

Slate editor-in-chief Julia Turner joins Here & Now’s Robin Young to take a look at this story, as well as other stories reverberating on social media, including the death of Bangladeshi-American blogger Avijit Roy and security concerns about the payment app Venmo.
